data.markdown:
## Description The image is a logo featuring the word "KÄRCHER" in bold, uppercase letters. The text is black and set against a bright yellow background. Below the text, there is a solid black horizontal line. The logo is simple and uses high contrast colors to ensure visibility and brand recognition. ## K 2 HORIZONTAL VPS Klein und platzsparend: Der K 2 Horizontal VPS ist der Hochdruckreiniger für gelegentliche Einsätze bei leichten Verschmutzungen, wie z. B. an Fahrrädern, Gartenwerkzeugen sowie -möbeln. ## Description The image shows a yellow pressure washer set, which includes several components: 1. **Main Unit**: - The main body of the pressure washer is yellow with a black handle on top for easy carrying. - It has a vented design on the front, likely for cooling purposes. - There is a black circular knob on the left side, possibly for adjusting pressure or connecting hoses. - The brand name is visible on the front. 2. **Hose**: - A coiled black hose is included, which connects the main unit to the spray gun. 3. **Spray Gun**: - The spray gun is black with a yellow trigger, designed for ergonomic handling. - It connects to the hose and is used to direct the water spray. 4. **Lance**: - A long black lance is shown, which attaches to the spray gun to extend its reach and focus the water stream. This set is typically used for cleaning surfaces with high-pressure water, suitable for tasks like washing cars, driveways, or patios. ## Key-Value Pair Bestell-Nr.: 1-600-9510 ## Technische Daten
EAN-Code 4066529156150
Stromart Ph / V / Hz 1 / 220 - 240 / 50 - 60
Druck bar 20 - max. 110
Fördermenge l/h max. 360
Flächenleistung m²/h max. 20
Zulauftemperatur °C max. 40
Anschlussleistung W 1400
Anschlusskabel m 5
Farbe gelb
Gewicht ohne Zubehör kg 3,5
Gewicht inkl. Verpackung kg 4,9
Abmessungen (L × B × H) mm 380 × 197 × 248
## Ausstattung
Hochdruckpistole G 120 Q
Vario Power Jet [x]
Geräteseitiges Quick Connect [x]
Reinigungsmittelansatz über Ansaugschlauch
Integrierter Wasserfilter [x]
Adapter Gartenschlauchanschluss A3/4" [x]
Kabelaufwicklung [ ]
## Description The image is a badge from the Guinness World Records. It features a circular emblem with the text "GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS" around the top and sides. In the center, there is a stylized trophy or cup icon. Below the emblem, there is a rectangular section with the text "RECORD HOLDER" in bold, capital letters. The color scheme includes blue, white, and gold. This badge signifies that the holder has achieved a world record recognized by Guinness World Records. ## Description The image is a cropped section from a document, featuring a bold, attention-grabbing design. It includes the following text: - **World's No. 1 Pre-Sliced Deli Brand** The text is set against a bright yellow background shaped like an arrow pointing to the right, with a large, stylized number "1" in gray on the left side. The design suggests a focus on ranking or superiority in a specific category, emphasizing the brand's leading position in the market for pre-sliced deli products. ## Description The image is a logo or icon with a black background and yellow elements. It features a stylized representation of a pressure washer nozzle, with a plus sign and an arrow pointing to the right. Below the graphic, the text "VARIO POWER" is written in capital letters. The design suggests adjustable power settings for a pressure washer, indicated by the arrow and plus sign, which imply increasing power or intensity.

## Description

The image is a logo featuring the word "KÄRCHER" in bold, uppercase letters. The text is black and set against a bright yellow background. Below the text, there is a solid black horizontal line. The logo is simple and uses high contrast colors to ensure visibility and brand recognition.

## K 2 HORIZONTAL VPS

Klein und platzsparend: Der K 2 Horizontal VPS ist der Hochdruckreiniger für gelegentliche Einsätze bei leichten Verschmutzungen, wie z. B. an Fahrrädern, Gartenwerkzeugen sowie -möbeln.

## Description

The image shows a yellow pressure washer set, which includes several components:

1. **Main Unit**: 
   - The main body of the pressure washer is yellow with a black handle on top for easy carrying.
   - It has a vented design on the front, likely for cooling purposes.
   - There is a black circular knob on the left side, possibly for adjusting pressure or connecting hoses.
   - The brand name is visible on the front.

2. **Hose**:
   - A coiled black hose is included, which connects the main unit to the spray gun.

3. **Spray Gun**:
   - The spray gun is black with a yellow trigger, designed for ergonomic handling.
   - It connects to the hose and is used to direct the water spray.

4. **Lance**:
   - A long black lance is shown, which attaches to the spray gun to extend its reach and focus the water stream.

This set is typically used for cleaning surfaces with high-pressure water, suitable for tasks like washing cars, driveways, or patios.

## Technische Daten
EAN-Code 4066529156150
Stromart Ph / V / Hz 1 / 220 - 240 / 50 - 60
Druck bar 20 - max. 110
Fördermenge l/h max. 360
Flächenleistung m²/h max. 20
Zulauftemperatur °C max. 40
Anschlussleistung W 1400
Anschlusskabel m 5
Farbe gelb
Gewicht ohne Zubehör kg 3,5
Gewicht inkl. Verpackung kg 4,9
Abmessungen (L × B × H) mm 380 × 197 × 248

## Ausstattung
Hochdruckpistole G 120 Q
Vario Power Jet [x]
Geräteseitiges Quick Connect [x]
Reinigungsmittelansatz über Ansaugschlauch

## Description

The image is a badge from the Guinness World Records. It features a circular emblem with the text "GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS" around the top and sides. In the center, there is a stylized trophy or cup icon. Below the emblem, there is a rectangular section with the text "RECORD HOLDER" in bold, capital letters. The color scheme includes blue, white, and gold. This badge signifies that the holder has achieved a world record recognized by Guinness World Records.

## Description

The image is a cropped section from a document, featuring a bold, attention-grabbing design. It includes the following text:

- **World's No. 1 Pre-Sliced Deli Brand**

The text is set against a bright yellow background shaped like an arrow pointing to the right, with a large, stylized number "1" in gray on the left side. The design suggests a focus on ranking or superiority in a specific category, emphasizing the brand's leading position in the market for pre-sliced deli products.

## Description

The image is a logo or icon with a black background and yellow elements. It features a stylized representation of a pressure washer nozzle, with a plus sign and an arrow pointing to the right. Below the graphic, the text "VARIO POWER" is written in capital letters. The design suggests adjustable power settings for a pressure washer, indicated by the arrow and plus sign, which imply increasing power or intensity.
